name: Leanne Graham
review: This headphone is beast! I brought it 6 month ago.. sound quality is awesome! and I must say price is prety reasonable then other headphons in the same specs!

name: Ervin Howell
review: Very comfortable, very good looking, and AMAZING BATTERY LIFE! I will say they could be a little louder.I might not be the best judge. Either way 10/10 would recommend!

name: Deckow Crist
review: I was skeptical because of some of the reviews I saw but just buy them!! I use them to work out and they are so great. They cancel out most noise around you and the sound quality is great!

name: Clementine Bauch
review: I really like these headphones. The sound cancellation is good. The audio is good. The price isn't too high. My only problem was that I wanted to use them at night for sleeping. They are made of thin plastic. That is good for lightweight.

name: Dennis Schulist
review: My daughter has had these for 3 months and hasn't been able to live without them since she got them. The noise canceling must be awesome because even when I yell for her, she can't hear me calling her from nearby.

name: Glenna Reichert
review: Honestly there is nothing I disliked. It's exactly what my son wanted and asked for... I received them very quick!!! He's happy so I'm happy
